# NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.seconds(_:)

**Case**

Keepalives are enabled with a custom timeout, in seconds.

## Declaration

```swift
case seconds(Int)
```

## Keepalive Behaviors

- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.on**: Keepalives are enabled with the default timeout.
- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.off**: Keepalives are disabled.
